duties_responsibilities.duty: Conduct industry, client, and competitive research to support sales and marketing efforts.
Collaborate with program managers, executive leaders, and functional staff to support business development, capture, and proposal efforts.
Assist in the development and implementation of business plans.
Develops and maintains client profiles and responsible for updating CRM and related administrative activities.
Oversees and ensures the accuracy of the database management of clients, contacts, and information contained in CRM.
Assists with account management of designated customers and gathering information to develop strong client relationships.
Performs other sales and marketing duties as assigned.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Business, Marketing, or related field (Master's preferred)
